File /std/book_dir.c

Make a book with all the files in a dir.

Written by Pinkfish

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/book.c

This class includes the following files /include/nroff.h

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
query_language
string query_language()
Returns the language of the book

set_book_dir
void set_book_dir(string dir)
Sets the directory to look for the book pages in. It scans every file in this dir to get the pages for the book. This sets the default paper to /obj/misc/nroff_paper.c

Parameters:
dir - the directory in which to search
See also:
/obj/misc/nroff_paper.c
Example: 
inherit "/std/book_dir";

void setup() {
   ...
   set_book_dir("/save/books/dead/dead_page");
   ...
} /* setup() */
